author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body_html: Just wondering after checking out +BANNED

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

guild.name: AskRuqqus

title: Which guilds have you been exiled from, if any?

body: Mone but occasionally I'll see a post from a user who blocked me which gives me a sensible chuckle
body_html: Mone but occasionally I'll see a post from a user who blocked me which gives me a sensible chuckle

post.body_html: Just wondering after checking out +BANNED
post.title: Which guilds have you been exiled from, if any?

body:
+stop5gglobal

I still don't understand why they're against it entirely. The gist I get is that they think it will turn us into a surveillance state, but that would happen regardless of 5g.
body_html:
+Stop5GGlobal

I still don't understand why they're against it entirely. The gist I get is that they think it will turn us into a surveillance state, but that would happen regardless of 5g.
